bill_title: to criminalize the transport of live marijuana plants regardless of weight.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to criminalize the transport of live marijuana plants regardless of weight. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 22-42 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any person who transports five or more live marijuana plants or seedlings is guilty of a Class 5 felony regardless of penalty which could be charged pursuant to § 22-42-6 if the weight of the live marijuana plants or seedlings were to be calculated. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
